title: Not able to join game queues
body: Anyone else have this issue? when i click "find match" nothing happens.

replies.body:
Hi folks - just an update here.

There was an incident on the OCE server earlier this morning (which lines up with when you got initially stuck in games / champ select).  This left some players in "ghost games", where different parts of the server think you are in a game, when you are not. 

Unfortunately, there's no way for us to re-sync this information without restarting the entire OCE platform.  It will eventually self-resolve, once those games expire, which in normal circumstances should take approximately 3 hours.

TL;DR - it should be fixed for each of you within the next hour.

Yeah, same here. What I don't understand is why the [https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) link isn't showing any issues?

Ruining my day off.
Hi Everyone, thanks for the reports. Agent Mindstar is on the case now, we'll update you when we know something.

You can't tell me what to do -_-





But yes - we're on the case now.  I'll update this thread as we know more.
Post ordering strikes again! I was replying to Gehirn :D
Getting the same issue, Annoying after I repaired, reinstalled and tried everything
Yeah im in the same boat; is there a fix yet or whats going on? is it only affecting some of us?
Same issue; got into a champ select that didn't start, and now it's been over and hour and I'm still unable to join a queue/make customs.

2 hours ago I got stuck in a game. Now I'm getting the same error than everyone else here.
If I try to create a new game with the Training Tool, I get "You cannot create a game because you are already in a game".
Our accounts are obviously marked as "in game". I reckon they will be released after the daily maintenance ?
I have the same issue it won't let me queue up even if i'm in a party and someone else is the owner.
i dont have the issue unless my internet is slow. generally reloading client and being patient will fix this issue
